output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential trap due to overflow of 'mintedAmount + balanceOf[target]'.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * buyPrice'.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
buy function does not use random numbers, allowing attackers to control the price of the token.
